meanings.definition: Soil that formed in the past and has been preserved in the rock record.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study paleosols to learn about ancient soil.
meanings.sent2: The paleosols found in this area reveal secrets of the past.
meanings.sent3: The paleosols whispered stories of bygone days to the curious researchers.
meanings.sent4: The layers of paleosols in the earth's history book tell tales of ancient landscapes.
meanings.sent5: Walking through the paleosols felt like stepping back in time.

meanings.definition: Ancient soil layers that provide information about past climates and environments.
meanings.sent1: Paleosols help scientists understand past climates better.
meanings.sent2: The study of paleosols reveals changes in ancient environments.
meanings.sent3: The paleosols giggled as they shared climate secrets with the researchers.
meanings.sent4: In the layers of paleosols, the history of past environments is written.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the paleosols painted a vivid picture of ancient landscapes.
